title: If I buy the championship riven statue but i don't have riven will i receive riven with her skin?
body: If I buy the championship riven statue but i don't have riven will i receive riven with her skin?

replies.body:
Yes, the skin should be a champ/skin bundle. If you don't get Riven with the Skin unlock, write us in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Will i receive the code in the box or on my account?
During the checkout process, you'll be prompted to redeem the code for your account digitally. There is no physical code for this.
is the skin championship riven 2016 or the old one ?
The 2016 one. The old one is exclusively for players that owned the skin prior to the visual update and re-release.
